DOC.brief_summary: The focus study determine prevalence variance self-reported knee pain characteristic community-derived sample adult age 40 year . It also identify characteristic structural change osteoarthritis knee well physiological parameter blood urine biomarkers .
DOC.detailed_description: Number participant : Part I : questionnaire 30,000 people age 40 year ( give expect 10,000 respondent ) Part II : 450 participant .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Aged 4080 year . Exclusion criterion : Inability give inform consent Terminal mental illness Pregnant woman
